name: Virginia Deluxe Room | 2 Queens
description: Spacious dual queen rooms in the Virginia Tower offering comfortable accommodations for up to four guests. Features two queen-size beds, High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee.
shortDescription: Spacious dual queen room in the Virginia Tower, ideal for groups of up to four.

meta.title: Virginia Deluxe Room 2 Queens – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Virginia Deluxe Room with two queens at Eldorado Resort Reno – spacious accommodations for up to four guests.
